name: Schmetterlinge
description:
This the first game I made in java. 

Press WASD to move around and E to open up the shop menu. 

press 1, 2, 3, or 4 to buy upgrades with points. 

move until the static screen in the bottom right become clear then press SPACE to receive a point

WARNING : this game is mind-numbingly boring, it is advised NOT to play
